text:
Lahai is a village in Pathanamthitta district, Kerala state,India.
Language.
Malayalam is the native language of Lahai.
Geogrphy.
Most of the regions in Lahai are covered by forest.
Politics.
Lahai is a part of Pathanamthitta Loksabha constituency. Mr. Anto Antony is the current Member of Parliament of the constituency.
Economy.
The major income of the people are from rubber cultivation.
Weather.
The climate of the place is moderate and pleasant. Tropical climate is prevailed here throughout the year. Significant rainfall occur in the months June, July and August.
Transportation.
The major transportation service of this place is provided by Kerala State Road Transport Corporation (KSRTC).
